com.nexmo.sdk.verify.core.event

Interface BaseClientListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VerifyClient

    public interface BaseClientListener
    Base interface that notifies the VerifyClient on incoming events from all the services.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleErrorResult(int resultCode)
      Handle the error result code.
      void handleNetworkException(java.io.IOException exception)
      Notify all listeners of a network connectivity exception.
      void handleUserStateChanged(UserStatus userStatus)
      Notify all listeners of a user status change.
      void notifyErrorListeners(VerifyError verifyError)
      Notify all VerifyClientListeners on error events.

    • Method Detail

      • handleErrorResult

        void handleErrorResult(int resultCode)
        Handle the error result code. Notify all listeners on response codes.
        Parameters:
        resultCode - The response code.

      • notifyErrorListeners

        void notifyErrorListeners(VerifyError verifyError)
        Notify all VerifyClientListeners on error events.
        Parameters:
        verifyError - The verify error code.

      • handleUserStateChanged

        void handleUserStateChanged(UserStatus userStatus)
        Notify all listeners of a user status change.
        Parameters:
        userStatus - The new user status.

        void handleNetworkException(java.io.IOException exception)
        Notify all listeners of a network connectivity exception.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception.
